title: It's your heart
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cardiovascular patients - Rehabilitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cardiovascular system
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Heart - Diseases
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Exercise
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diet
description: Men who have suffered heart attacks tell their stories while the film shows them at exercise or at work. There is also a lecture by a heart specialist to a group of men and women in which he answers questions ranging from diet to sexual activity.
